test.welcome:
Welcome to your new farm! I have put a couple of seeds into your Inventory, so you can start to grow some crops right away. You can access the inventory by pressing [{keyMapping.inventory}]. 
Oh, you may want to know how the other controls work first... Press [{keyMapping.up}], [{keyMapping.down}], [{keyMapping.left}] or [{keyMapping.right}] to walk around. [{keyMapping.item1}], [{keyMapping.item2}] and [{keyMapping.interact}] are the three action buttons. 
You can see what they are currently doing at the top right corner of the sceen. [{keyMapping.interact}] is used to interact with your environment. The buttons [{keyMapping.item1}] and [{keyMapping.item2}] are where you can use your equipped items. While in the inventory, press one of those buttons to equip the currently selected item. 
A few meters in front of you there are patches of fertile soil. As a first task, you should equip one of your seed bags and start planting your crops!

intro.text: What you you want to know more about?

help.controls:
Movement:
Press [{keyMapping.up}], [{keyMapping.down}], [{keyMapping.left}] or [{keyMapping.right}] to walk around. 
Actions:
Press [{keyMapping.interact}] to interact with your environment (Talking to other people, inspect objects and reading signs). The current action is displayed in the top right of the screen.
[{keyMapping.inventory}] opens and closes your inventory. There you can inspect the items you are currently holding, as well as some other useful information. While in the inventory, press either [{keyMapping.item1}] or [{keyMapping.item2}] to equip the currently selected item to the respective button. This lets you use it in the game.
help.farming: On your farm there are two areas of fertile soil. When you are facing them, a red rectangle indicates a part of that soil where you can plant something. To do that, you have to have a seed bag equipped to [{keyMapping.item1}] or [{keyMapping.item2}]. Once you have planted something, it takes a couple of days to grow. You can inspect the plant to see its current status. Once a plant is ready, you can use a scythe to harvest it. This leaves the patch of soil empty for the next crop. Attention: If you wait too long, crops will eventually start to wilt and you won't get any harvest from them.
help.economy: Next to the right is the shop. Here you can buy and sell any items. The controls are the same as in your inventory.
help.other: Working is hard. On the top right part of the screen is a green bar, which indicates your stamina. Every action depletes a part of it. Once it is completely drained, you can't work any more for that day. Go to your house to sleep until the next morning. This refills your stamina.
